fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Clean your target's house, this will hide all night feedback they would have recieved from another role.
- Follow a target, if they visit someone that dies tonight you will clean that player's body.

fields.name: Atrributes:
fields.value:
- If you clean the house of an investigative target, you will steal their role feedback.
- Cleaning a player's body will hide their role, will and cause of death, they will appear as Cleaned, you will privately learn all of that.
- You may only follow your faction members twice.
